name: test_haproxy_route_integration
description:
Deploy the charm with anycharm haproxy-route requirer that installs apache2.

    Assert that the requirer endpoint is available.
descriptionHtml:
Deploy the charm with anycharm haproxy-route requirer that installs apache2.

Assert that the requirer endpoint is available.
